title: Win 10 installation problem
body: Well, after all of my problems with downloading and applying patches i tried to go to a login screen, but then bug splats arrived. One after one and without shutting down LoL they were arriving all the time. No idea what to do and i didn't see topics like my so can u help me? {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Bugsplatting at the login screen can be caused by either a security setting prevent game files from loading (like antivirus block), or a bad installation.  To start, go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help troubleshoot.  Let me know if it does the trick!

well I have the same problem, haven't played for long. and now I wanted to make a return but can't download the game.
the download continues with 4.3gb remaining to download and when it drops to 3.8-3.9gb bugsplat will arrive and next time I try the launcher will start downloading from 4.3gb remaining again..
